faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers about our services and processes

items.question: How long does it take to develop a project?
items.answer: The timeline varies according to project complexity. Simple websites can take 2-4 weeks, while more complex systems can take 2-6 months. We always provide a detailed timeline after initial analysis.

items.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 3-month warranty for bug fixes and technical support. We also have monthly maintenance plans for continuous updates and improvements.

items.question: How does the development process work?
items.answer: We follow an agile methodology: 1) Briefing and planning, 2) Design and prototyping, 3) Iterative development, 4) Testing and validation, 5) Delivery and training. You follow each step of the process.

items.question: What technologies do you work with?
items.answer: We use modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, React Native, Flutter, and many others. We choose the ideal stack for each project based on specific requirements.

items.question: Is it possible to make changes during development?
items.answer: Yes, our agile methodology allows adjustments during development. Small changes are included in the scope, major changes are evaluated and budgeted separately.
